overview: Project transformation from a basic app into Aorteq, a medical study companion application focusing on exam preparation and personalized study plans.
key_events: Complete architectural transition to MVVM pattern
Removal of existing luxury chauffeur service features
Addition of exam selection and study planning features
Integration of personalized study plan generation
user_requests: Transform app into medical study companion 'Aorteq'
Implement authentication flow with Google and email options
Add exam and topic selection functionality
Create study time allocation and planning features
Develop personalized study plan generation system
system_responses: Designed new architecture with MVVM pattern and proper separation of concerns
Created authentication flow with multiple sign-in options
Developed exam selection interface with search functionality
Implemented study planning system with calendar integration
Added analytics and offline data management capabilities
current_state: Aorteq is structured as a medical study companion app with authentication, exam selection, and study planning features. The system uses MVVM architecture with comprehensive state management, offline support, and security measures for user data protection.
